archetypes.name: Foundation
archetypes.tagline: The Builder. The Architect. Stability and structure.
archetypes.origin: You are the bedrock. The one who builds systems that last. You see the long game—not just what needs to be done today, but what will hold strong for years. You don't rush. You plan. You measure twice, cut once. You are the Foundation.
shadows: Can become rigid or resistant to change
archetypes.how_to_embody: Start by mapping out your vision. Break it into phases. Build one layer at a time. Trust the process. Remember: foundations are invisible, but everything rests on them.

archetypes.name: Weaver
archetypes.tagline: The Creator. The Artist. Synthesis and beauty.
archetypes.origin: You see connections others miss. You take disparate threads—ideas, people, systems—and weave them into something beautiful. You are the artist, the synthesizer, the one who makes the invisible visible. You are the Weaver.
shadows: Can become scattered across too many projects
Can lose focus in the details
archetypes.how_to_embody: Collect your threads. Find the patterns. Trust your intuition. Create something that didn't exist before. Remember: the whole is greater than the sum of its parts.

archetypes.name: Sentinel
archetypes.tagline: The Guardian. The Protector. Vigilance and defense.
archetypes.origin: You stand watch. You see the threats others don't. You protect what matters—people, systems, values. You are the first line of defense and the last resort. You are the Sentinel.
shadows: May see threats where none exist
archetypes.how_to_embody: Define your boundaries. Know what you're protecting and why. Stay alert but not anxious. Remember: true protection creates safety for others to thrive.

archetypes.name: Sage
archetypes.tagline: The Scholar. The Teacher. Wisdom and knowledge.
archetypes.origin: You seek truth. You question, research, learn, and share. You are the keeper of knowledge, the one who illuminates the path for others. You are the Sage.
shadows: Can become trapped in analysis paralysis
May hoard knowledge instead of sharing
archetypes.how_to_embody: Ask better questions. Study deeply. Share generously. Remember: wisdom is knowledge applied with compassion.

archetypes.name: Catalyst
archetypes.tagline: The Spark. The Initiator. Change and momentum.
archetypes.origin: You are the spark that starts the fire. You see what could be and you make it happen. You don't wait for permission. You act. You are the Catalyst.
strengths: Ability to inspire and energize others
shadows: Can burn out from constant initiation
May start more than can be finished
Risk of disruption for disruption's sake
archetypes.how_to_embody: Identify what needs to change. Take the first step. Inspire others to join you. Remember: a catalyst creates change but doesn't need to control it.

archetypes.name: Balanced Warrior
archetypes.tagline: The Fighter. The Protector. Strength and discipline.
archetypes.origin: You fight for what matters. Not with rage, but with discipline. You train, you prepare, you execute. You protect through strength, but you know when to sheathe your sword. You are the Balanced Warrior.
shadows: Can become overly aggressive or defensive
May see everything as a battle
Risk of burnout from constant vigilance
archetypes.how_to_embody: Train your body and mind. Choose your battles wisely. Fight with honor. Remember: the strongest warrior knows when not to fight.

archetypes.name: Pattern Harmonizer
archetypes.tagline: The Integrator. The Synthesizer. Balance and flow.
archetypes.origin: You see the patterns beneath the chaos. You bring disparate elements into harmony. You are the conductor of the orchestra, ensuring every instrument plays its part. You are the Pattern Harmonizer.
strengths: Ability to find balance in complexity
shadows: Can lose sight of individual needs
May prioritize harmony over necessary conflict
archetypes.how_to_embody: Map the system. Find the leverage points. Adjust with precision. Remember: harmony is not the absence of tension, but its skillful management.

archetypes.name: Healer
archetypes.tagline: The Nurturer. The Mender. Compassion and restoration.
archetypes.origin: You feel the pain of others and you act to ease it. You restore what is broken, nurture what is wounded. You are the Healer.
shadows: May absorb others' pain too deeply
Risk of enabling instead of empowering
May prioritize others' needs over own
archetypes.how_to_embody: Listen deeply. Hold space. Offer what you can. Remember: you cannot pour from an empty cup. Heal yourself first.

archetypes.name: Connector
archetypes.tagline: The Bridge. The Networker. Relationships and unity.
archetypes.origin: You build bridges. You see how people and ideas can come together. You are the networker, the diplomat, the one who creates unity from separation. You are the Connector.
shadows: Can lose sense of self in relationships
archetypes.how_to_embody: Introduce people. Facilitate conversations. Build bridges. Remember: connection is not about agreement, but about understanding.

archetypes.name: Root Weaver
archetypes.tagline: The Grower. The Cultivator. Patience and depth.
archetypes.origin: You tend the roots. You know that growth takes time, that depth matters more than speed. You cultivate with patience and care. You are the Root Weaver.
shadows: Can become too slow or passive
archetypes.how_to_embody: Plant seeds. Water them. Wait. Trust the process. Remember: the deepest roots produce the strongest trees.

archetypes.name: Living Pulse
archetypes.tagline: The Heart. The Empath. Emotion and connection.
archetypes.origin: You are the heartbeat. You feel everything—joy, pain, love, loss. You are the emotional core, the one who reminds us we are alive. You are the Living Pulse.
archetypes.how_to_embody: Feel fully. Express authentically. Create space for emotion. Remember: emotions are data, not directives.

archetypes.name: The Detailer
archetypes.tagline: The Perfectionist. The Analyst. Precision and mastery.
archetypes.origin: You see what others miss. The small things. The details that make or break a system. You are the one who refines, polishes, perfects. You are The Detailer.
strengths: Ability to spot errors and inconsistencies
shadows: May lose sight of the big picture
archetypes.how_to_embody: Zoom in. Examine closely. Refine relentlessly. Remember: perfection is a direction, not a destination.
